page.title: 07A SCHOOL DAY IN SKELMORLIE
page.content: School begins at 0900 hours when a bell rings, all the children file in and go to their classes.In P6 we say "Good Morning" to our teacher and then say the Lords Prayer. We usually begin by doing Mathemat- ical work,either number work or per- haps measuring and scale or graph work We do both practical work and comput- ation. Then we move on to English based work reading,writing,using the library,ans- wering questions and discussing.This work is usually related to our Project This year our projects have been The Plague and Great Fire of London,Energy Weather and Our Village.Environmental Studies,Music and Art are also linked in. We have a lunch break from 1230-1330 hours and finish at 1515 hours.We go to school from Monday to Friday.
